id.description: Unique identifier for the engagement note

createdAt.description: The date and time when the note was created

updatedAt.description: Date and time when the note was last updated

archived.description: Indicates if the note has been archived

contacts.description: Contacts associated with the engagement note

deals.description: Deals associated with the engagement note

companies.description: Companies associated with the engagement note

tickets.description: Tickets associated with the engagement note
